name: EEL-Lectric
description:
Play As The Blue eel and Escape The Containment...

Controls:

you guide the eel to the direction you want it to go

AKA click and drag to move the eel

BUT you can also use click and drag to grab certain objects in the game

GOALS:

ESCAPE

The faster you escape the better you're points

duh

And also, try not to die...

Whaat, you can die?

Yes, there are enemies that will try to stop you from escaping

spoilers: the enemies have a flame thrower :o

so be carefull
